name: eft xml base
description: start of an eve xml parse tool to convert to eft format
content:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<fittings>
	<fitting name="Manticore - t2">

		<shipType value="Manticore"/>

		<hardware slot="rig slot 1" type="Small Hydraulic Bay Thrusters I"/>
	</fitting>	<fitting name="Manticore - dual masb setup">

		<hardware slot="hi slot 3" type="Covert Ops Cloaking Device II"/>
